content: single_crochet in same space single_crochet in next chain space *chain 1 single_crochet in next chain space repeat from * until you are at the centre top of the wheel work an extra single_crochet in this space chain 1 single_crochet in next chain space x 2 single_crochet in next chain space x 2 repeat from * around join to 1st single_crochet with slip_stitch fasten_off optional 4th colour/row row 4 repeat row 2 but between wheels work 3 x single_crochet no chains
